instructions.movement: Start with left hand on the first hold
instructions.body_position: Standing at the base, reach up with left hand
instructions.instruction: Step 1: Start with left hand on the first hold. Standing at the base, reach up with left hand

instructions.movement: Place right hand on the next hold
instructions.body_position: Weight balanced between both arms, feet on starting holds or features
instructions.instruction: Step 2: Place right hand on the next hold. Weight balanced between both arms, feet on starting holds or features

instructions.movement: Place left foot on the green pinch
instructions.body_position: Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move left next.
instructions.instruction: Step 3: Place left foot on the green pinch. Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move left next.

instructions.movement: Place right foot on the green crimp
instructions.body_position: Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move right next.
instructions.instruction: Step 4: Place right foot on the green crimp. Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move right next.

instructions.movement: Move left hand to the green crimp
instructions.body_position: Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Crimp carefully with straight fingers.
instructions.instruction: Step 5: Move left hand to the green crimp. Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Crimp carefully with straight fingers.

instructions.movement: Move right hand to the green crimp
instructions.body_position: Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Crimp carefully with straight fingers.
instructions.instruction: Step 6: Move right hand to the green crimp. Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Crimp carefully with straight fingers.

instructions.movement: Place left foot on the green pinch
instructions.body_position: Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move right next.
instructions.instruction: Step 7: Place left foot on the green pinch. Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move right next.

instructions.movement: Place right foot on the yellow sloper
instructions.body_position: Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move left next.
instructions.instruction: Step 8: Place right foot on the yellow sloper. Shift your weight as you move your foot. Prepare to move left next.

instructions.movement: Move left hand to the orange jug
instructions.body_position: Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Full grip with fingers wrapped around the jug.
instructions.instruction: Step 9: Move left hand to the orange jug. Keep your center of gravity beneath your handholds. Full grip with fingers wrapped around the jug.

instructions.movement: Place left foot on the red jug
instructions.body_position: Shift your weight as you move your foot.
instructions.instruction: Step 10: Place left foot on the red jug. Shift your weight as you move your foot.
